name: Sun Mandala //  Red & Green & Black
description: A Mandala is one's imaginary palace for contemplating the universe. Each object represents an aspect of wisdom or a principle.  Slow the mind, watch it turn, disappear then return. This Mandala is a pulsing sun like array of primitive objects with simple colours. The artwork is part of a series that is intended to explore what is possible when constrained to extremely simple shapes and colours. Can they lead to transcendence?   [Key Variables: numPoints: 64, minSides:24, maxSides: 128]
